hf_response.name: SATP_MODE_ACCESS_TYPE
hf_response.description: Access type for the MODE field is read‑write with hardware‑reset semantics.

hf_response.name: SATP_MODE_CONTROLS_TRANSLATION
hf_response.description: Controls the current translation mode according to the table below.
hf_response.spec_quote: Controls the current translation mode according to the table below.

hf_response.name: SATP_ASID_ACCESS_TYPE
hf_response.description: Access type for the ASID field is read‑write with hardware‑reset semantics.

hf_response.name: SATP_PPN_ACCESS_TYPE
hf_response.description: Access type for the PPN field is read‑write with hardware‑reset semantics.

hf_response.name: SATP_PPN_ALIGNMENT_REQUIREMENT
hf_response.description: PPN is shifted left by 12 bits, so the stored value must be page‑aligned.
hf_response.spec_quote: The physical address of the active root page table is PPN << 12.

scout_response.name: SATP_MODE_LEGAL_VALUES
scout_response.description: SATP.MODE must support at least 0 (Bare) and 8 (Sv39) and 9 (Sv48) and 10 (Sv57)
scout_response.spec_quote: The supported modes are implementation-specific but must include 0 (Bare), 8 (Sv39), 9 (Sv48), and 10 (Sv57)

scout_response.name: SATP_MODE_CONTROLS_TRANSLATION
scout_response.description: SATP.MODE determines translation mechanism (Bare, Sv39, Sv48, Sv57)

scout_response.name: SATP_ASID_LEGAL_VALUES
scout_response.description: ASID field holds a valid Address Space Identifier
scout_response.spec_quote: ASID field holds a valid address space identifier

scout_response.name: SATP_PPN_LEGAL_VALUES
